title: User Authentication and Onboarding
summary: Enable secure registration, login, and identity verification
description: Develop secure onboarding processes including user registration with KYC verification and login functionalities with multi-factor authentication. Ensure encrypted password storage, session management, and compliance with banking security regulations. The onboarding process must include steps such as document upload, identity validation, and consent collection for data privacy.

title: Customer Profile Management
summary: Allow users to manage and update their profiles
description: Design modules for customers to manage their personal and contact information such as address, phone number, and email. Include functionality for viewing customer details, verification for sensitive updates, and maintaining an audit trail for all changes. Provide intuitive UI components to simplify updates across devices.

title: Accounts Overview Dashboard
summary: Show consolidated account information and summaries
description: Create a central dashboard that displays all customer accounts, available balances, mini statements, and quick navigation to transactions. Provide account summaries, account number obfuscation for privacy, and streamlined access to financial tools and offerings. Ensure a responsive design and accessibility compliance.

title: Funds Transfer and Payments
summary: Enable internal, domestic, and international transfers
description: Implement fund transfer options including intra-bank, inter-bank, and international transfers. Enable scheduled transfers, beneficiary management, and support for various payment modes such as IMPS, NEFT, RTGS, and SWIFT. Ensure compliance with transaction limits, AML checks, and provide real-time transfer status notifications.

title: Bill Payment Services
summary: Facilitate recurring and one-time bill payments
description: Develop functionality to let users pay their utility bills, credit cards, insurance premiums, and recharges. Include linking and managing billers, scheduling payments, and setting up reminders. Integrate secure payment gateways and provide instant confirmation receipts.

title: Transaction History and Statements
summary: Provide transaction logs and downloadable statements
description: Create modules for users to view comprehensive transaction history, filter by date and type, and generate downloadable account statements. Enable downloadable formats including PDF, CSV, and XLS. Include secure delivery options via email or app notifications.

title: Card Management Tools
summary: Enable customers to manage debit and credit cards
description: Build features allowing cardholders to view card details, set and modify transaction limits, temporarily suspend or reactivate cards, and report lost or stolen cards. Allow users to track card transactions and request new or replacement cards. Integrate real-time communication on card status updates.

title: Loans and Credit Services
description: Develop loan and credit modules enabling customers to apply for personal, home, and auto loans. Support loan eligibility checks, document uploads, approval tracking, and repayment calculation. Enable EMI management and notifications for repayment schedules and due dates.

title: Alerts and Notification System
summary: Provide transaction alerts and account notifications
description: Implement real-time notifications that alert users of transactions, low balances, and important events through SMS, push notifications, or email. Add user preferences for delivery channels and message frequency. Include security alerts for high-risk login attempts and new device sign-ins.

title: Security and Fraud Monitoring
summary: Enhance application security and fraud prevention mechanisms
description: Implement advanced fraud monitoring systems using rule-based and AI-driven detection algorithms. Incorporate transaction scoring, anomaly detection, and user behavior analytics to prevent fraud attempts. Strengthen security with biometric authentication, encryption updates, and continuous compliance reviews.

title: Financial Insights and Recommendations
description: Leverage data analysis and machine learning to deliver financial insights such as spending patterns, savings suggestions, and investment opportunities. Present visual graphs, trends over time, and customized financial goals to encourage better financial management.

title: Customer Support and Chatbot Integration
summary: Integrate chat support and intelligent chatbot services
description: Add an AI-driven chatbot to handle basic customer inquiries and troubleshooting. Enable ticket creation for unresolved queries, live chat handover, and FAQs for common issues. Provide real-time support tracking and automated updates on ticket resolution status.
